Code:
awk 'BEGIN{for(i=-4;i<=4;i++) for(j=0;j<5;j++){r=-0.5+exp(i/8);a=3.141592653589793*2*j/5;x=r*cos(a);y=r*sin(a);print x,y,0.2*i;}}'
